**Progression Charts** | [2021 Season](/elo2021/) | [Daily Ratings Since 2013](/elohistory/) |
<br>

```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(readr))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
d <- suppressMessages(read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/predictions.csv"))
teamstats <- suppressMessages(read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/teamstats21.csv"))
d <- d %>% left_join(teamstats, by = "Team")
d <- d %>% select(Rank, Team, Elo, wRCplus, FIP, everything()) %>% arrange(Rank)
d$Team <- paste0("[", d$Team, "](/teams/", gsub(" ", "", d$Team), ")") 

d$First[1] <- 100
d$First[4] <- 0
d$Second[1] <- 0
d$Second[4] <- 100

kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,1,2,1,1,1,1,1,1), col.names = c("Rank","Team","Elo", "wRC+", "FIP", "1st","2nd","3rd","4th","5th","Out")) %>%
  add_header_above(c("Current Elos & 2021 Stats" = 5, "2021 Playoff Seed Likelihood (%)" = 6)) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(2, bold = T) %>% column_spec(5, border_right = T)
```
Projections based on 20,000 Monte Carlo simulations. See the [FAQ](https://www.kbofancystats.com/faq/eloratings/) for more details on Elo ratings.
